column4: I am having a problem where World of Warcraft has bad FPS and after about a minute hangs, as well as my whole PC and can't seem to find a solution for it. Here is some output related to my video card, http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/5608/. Does anyone have any idea of what I could try?
I'm running WoW on an AMD64 machine using an Nvidia 6600GT pci express card, but using Cedega rather than wine
I havent tried Wine by itself yet
Cedega is the one you pay for, right?
Is there a way I could try to see if I can get it working with like a trial version or something?
some people say that crossover office has less problems
you can get a 30 day trial of crossover - might be worth a go
ahh - I've yet to get the fglrx driver to work on my laptop :(
I dont think you can get a trial of it
maybe you need to get Cedega to use ALSA for audio IO or something
